# Visualization in R 

```{R}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(reticulate)
library(ggthemes)

summary_df <- py$main_df %>% 
  unnest(stimulus_id) %>% 
  mutate(stimuli_spec = 
           case_when(
             is.na(stimuli_spec) ~ stim_spec, 
             TRUE ~ stimuli_spec
           )) %>% 
  unnest(stimuli_spec) %>% 
  group_by(stimulus_id, stimuli, batch_id, j_i, stimuli_spec) %>% 
  count() 
  
  
summary_df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = stimulus_id, y = n, color = stimuli_spec)) + 
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", position = position_dodge(width = .4)) + 
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", geom = "line", position = position_dodge(width = .4)) + 
  facet_wrap(~stimuli) + 
  theme_few()

```


```{r}
summary_df %>%

    (stimuli == "BDBBBB" & stimulus_id == 1) |
```
